Text:
Thank you very much ,
I scanned it with nod32 and it has NO virusses ,
The book is good ,
I would reccomend to everyone :P

Thanks MasTer_DooM! Looked forever after the english version. Cant wait to dig into the awesome story wich I have already tasted from the game.

Cheers
Thanks, Game was awesome, so i just had to find the book! Much appreciated!
I kept seeing the book scattered around in the game and thought it might be a real book. Thanks a lot, I like post apocalyptic/dystopian reads and this (I imagine) will be great just like the game :)
@maling123 tnx for info dude , im going to read it , i played the game and it fascinated me , so il read the book now :)

Hey guys, very thankful.  I have a question can any one find the sequel 2034 in english???  Also I love the story/setting? Are their any other books like this I have been looking for a fallout like story line thanks in advance
same here, i played the game and i'm fascinated by post apocalyptic scenarios.  there is a sequel to the game called "last light" i think

Thank You!! 
I liked the game and in one of the missions I saw the book lying around on the metro rails. So i thought I would give it a look online. Since i'm not much of a book fan, i probably wouldn't read all of it so i'm not gonna buy it. So thanks for providing :)
